summary: Held in a remote police station, a mysterious stranger takes over the minds and souls of everyone inside.
cast: Liam Cunningham|Pollyanna McIntosh|Bryan Larkin|Hanna Stanbridge|Douglas Russell|Niall Greig Fulton|Jonathan Watson|Brian Vernel|James McCreadie|Sophie Stephanie Farmer|Andrew Parker|Holly Beattie|Katie Gilbourne|Max McCarthy|Ellen Keaveney
title: Let Us Prey
